name: Umpires Call
description:
Unique game for all the cricket lovers in the world where you play as the Umpire competing to make the longest streak of correct LBW decisions by predicting the true physics implemented in the game.

Play both local and world cup matches to make it to the top of the leader board!

Game is available for iPhone and iPad at the App Store and for Android at Google Play

App Store:

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/cricket-umpires-call/id1459498778?ls=1

Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ImpactUnified.Umpire
